subject: Simsonn VAM
description_text:
Good evening,

I wanted to know what the availability of the VAM modules Look like, I ordered them on your Amazon page but they told me my pakage got lost. After trying to order again they told me they are no longer available which is unlucky as I got the pedals a while back and also ordered the Control Box which is now lying around without use as I cant get the haptic modules. Everything was meant as a christmas present which wont work out in time anymore I guess. 

Iam still wondering if I can get them somehow still

Greetings Maximilian 
Von meinem iPhone gesendet

conversations.body_text:
If you dont mind asking, how do I log into this Page, it seems like I cant reset my password. Greetings Max Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 16.12.2025 um 16:39 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ï»¿ 
 
 Hi Maximilian Stalla We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8429?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8429?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team 





 
 




8429:4206036
Hi Maximilian Stalla,    You can place an order on the official website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053467962
